text:
If FHR ranges between 
110 and 159, continue 
to assess FHR every 
30 minutes during the 
first stage and every 
5 minutes during the 
second stage of labour 
(10).
FH r deceleration
Listen to the FHR for a 
minimum of 1 minute. 
Auscultate during a 
uterine contraction and 
continue for at least 
30 seconds after the 
contraction.
Record the presence of 
decelerations using:
N = No
E = Early
L = Late
V = Variable
Alert: L = Late
Record the presence of 
decelerations (5).
